note.p: Polititian. Son of William Strutt. BA, Cambridge, 1823. Studied law at Lincoln’s Inn and the Inner Temple but was not called to the bar. MP for Derby, 1830–47; for Arundel, 1851; for Nottingham 1852–6. Created Baron Belper of Belper, Derbyshire, 1856. Honorary LLD, Cambridge, 1862. President, University College, London, 1871–9. FRS 1860.
